name: AmberGloves_IntermediateItem
description: This is an intermediate step of relic creation.

name: AmberLoveGlovesItem
description: Whenever the wearer of these gloves lands a critical hit with any bow, the enemy starts losing mind, thus suffering -1 damage to Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma.

enchant.name: AmberLoveGlovesEnchantment
effect: Add feature AmberLoveGlovesFeature

name: AmberLustGlovesItem
description: Whenever the wearer of these gloves lands a touch attack, the enemy must pass a Will saving throw (DC 20) or his heart and mind is consumed with agonizing lust, any critical hit against affected enemy drives him even crazier, paralyzing for one round.

enchant.name: AmberLustGlovesEnchantment
effect: Add feature AmberLustGlovesFeature

enchant.name: Strength8
effect: Add stat bonus 8 to Strength (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: BlessedHandsGlovesItem
description: These gloves adds +4 to the wearer's caster level when they cast any cure spell.

enchant.name: BlessedHandsGlovesEnchant
effect: AddCasterLevelEquipment
AddCasterLevelEquipment
AddCasterLevelEquipment
AddCasterLevelEquipment
AddCasterLevelEquipment
AddCasterLevelEquipment
AddCasterLevelEquipment
AddCasterLevelEquipment

name: BombThrowingGlovesItem
description: These gloves grant their wearer a +2 equipment bonus to attack rolls made with bombs and their DC.

enchant.name: BombThrowingGlovesEnchantment
effect: Add feature BombThrowingGlovesFeature

name: BracersSpikedHodagItem
description: These gloves grant its wearer a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength ability score and a +2 morale bonus to AC.

enchant.name: BracersSpikedHodagEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 4 to Strength (descriptor: Enhancement)
Add stat bonus 2 to AC (descriptor: Morale)

name: ButterflyWingsGlovesItem
description: These gloves grant their wearer a +5 resistance bonus on all saving throws, and the ability to cast prismatic spray spell three times per day as a 13th level wizard.

enchant.name: Resistance5
effect: AllSavesBonusEquipment

name: CheatSheetGlovesItem
description: These gloves grant their wearer a +5 luck bonus to Lore (Nature), Lore (Religion), Knowledge (World) and Knowledge (Arcana) skill checks.

enchant.name: CheatSheetGlovesEnchant
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillKnowledgeArcana (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 5 to SkillKnowledgeWorld (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 5 to SkillLoreNature (descriptor: Luck)
Add stat bonus 5 to SkillLoreReligion (descriptor: Luck)

name: ClawsOfAMonsterItem
description: These gloves have claws that deal 1d8 slashing damage on an unarmed attack. If the enemy is of evil alignment, they deal 2d6 damage instead. In addition, these claws give the wearer a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls.

enchant.name: ClawsOfAMonsterEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 1 to AdditionalDamage (descriptor: Enhancement)
Add stat bonus 1 to AdditionalAttackBonus (descriptor: Enhancement)
Add feature ClawsOfAMonsterFeature

name: CrazyScientistsGlovesItem
description: These gloves grant their wearer fire resistance 15 and acid resistance 15.

enchant.name: AcidResistance15Enchant
effect: Add feature AcidResistance15Feature

enchant.name: FireResistance15Enchant
effect: Add feature FireResistance15Feature

name: DeliquescentGlovesItem
description: Whenever the wearer of these gloves successfully lands a hit with a melee weapon, an unarmed strike, or a natural weapon, the target takes 1d6 points of acid damage.

enchant.name: DeliquescentGlovesEnchantment
effect: Add feature DeliquescentGlovesFeature

name: EvisceratorsGlovesItem
description: Whenever the wearer of these gloves makes a full attack and successfully strikes a single enemy with both their main-hand and off-hand weapons, the enemy suffers a -2 penalty on attack rolls and is bleeding for 3 rounds.

name: FencersGiftItem
description: These gloves grant their wearer a +3 damage bonus to the second weapon when dual wielding or wielding a two-handed weapon. If the wearer has the Weapon Training ability and is wielding a weapon it gives a bonus to, that bonus increases by +2.

enchant.name: FencersGiftEnchantment
effect: Add feature FencersGiftFeature

name: GlovesNumerianItem
description: These gloves grant its wearer a +2 enhancement bonus to Constitution ability score and a +4 competence bonus on all Mobility skill checks.

enchant.name: GlovesNumerianEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to Constitution (descriptor: Enhancement)
Add stat bonus 4 to SkillMobility (descriptor: Competence)

name: GlovesOfArcaneEradicationItem
description: These gloves grant the wearer a +4 bonus to ranged touch attack rolls and a +5 competence bonus on Use Magic Device skill checks.

enchant.name: GlovesOfArcaneEradicationEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillUseMagicDevice (descriptor: Competence)
Add feature GlovesOfArcaneEradicationFeature

name: GlovesOfDeathDealer
description: When the wearer of these gloves makes a sneak attack, it deals additional 1d6 damage.

enchant.name: SneakAttack1
effect: IncreaseStatEquipment

name: GlovesOfDexterityItem
description: These gloves grant its wearer a +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity. Bonuses of the same type usually don't stack.

enchant.name: Dexterity2
effect: Add stat bonus 2 to Dexterity (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: GlovesOfDuelingLesserItem
description: These gloves grant their wearer a +1 bonus to CMD against disarm attempts. If the wearer has the Weapon Training ability and is wielding a weapon it gives a bonus to, that bonus increases by +1.

enchant.name: GlovesOfDuelingEnchant
effect: Add feature GlovesOfDuelingFeature

name: GlovesOfDuelingNormalItem
description: These gloves grant their wearer a +4 bonus to CMD against disarm attempts. If the wearer has the Weapon Training ability and is wielding a weapon it gives a bonus to, that bonus increases by +2.

enchant.name: GlovesOfDuelingEnchant2
effect: Add feature GlovesOfDuelingFeature2

description: Whenever the wearer of these gloves lands a hit on a flanked enemy with a ranged weapon, they deal additional 2d6 damage both to the enemy and to the ally flanking it.
